name: drawr
description: A simple js library for constructing a you draw it chart

scripts.test: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/*.test.js | tape-run | tap-spec
scripts.start: watchify src/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --standalone drawr -o demo/drawr.js -v --debug

author: Nick Strayer <nick.strayer@gmail.com> (http://nickstrayer.me)
